wps:ParameterValue.wps:Name: inputGridCoverage
wps:ParameterValue.wps:Label: Input Grid Coverage
wps:ParameterValue.wps:Description: Coverage that will be processed. This can be a reference URI to a GeoTiff or a WCS request when returning a GeoTiff

wps:Reference.ows:Abstract: This is the GeoTIFF online source

wps:ParameterValue.wps:Name: valueToIgnore
wps:ParameterValue.wps:Label: Value to ignore
wps:ParameterValue.wps:Description: Some values might be known to not be the minimum value. They should be ignored in output statistics (e.g. 0 or -9999), Example: valueToIgnore = -9999
